channel.title: Acoustic Cafe Podcast
channel.description: This Podcast will give a glimpse of Acoustic Cafe in Bridgeport, Connecticut.
channel.itunes:subtitle: . |\!/| .. musical-storm of answers ... wind, we, us, all can listen to . |\!/| ..
channel.itunes:author: Marvin Cable
channel.itunes:summary: This Podcast will give a glimpse of Acoustic Cafe in Bridgeport, Connecticut.

item.title: Live Jam 1 - Manchado - Acoustic Cafe Podcast: Episode 13
item.description: This material was recorded and mixed live by Marvin Cable at the Acoustic Cafe late Spring 2007. The jam selected wasn't chosen by normal criteria that one would use to chose music for broadcast purposes. The jam was chosen because it had a sweet vibe. Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: Marvin Cable
item.itunes:summary: This material was recorded and mixed live by Marvin Cable at the Acoustic Cafe late Spring 2007. The jam selected wasn't chosen by normal criteria that one would use to chose music for broadcast purposes. The jam was chosen because it had a sweet vibe. Enjoy!
